Package voltage.sources

Class AnalogOscillator

java.lang.Object
voltage.sources.OscillatorBaseClass
voltage.sources.AnalogOscillator
public class AnalogOscillator
extends OscillatorBaseClass
An oscillator that approximates analog circuits. Oscillators return values from -5.0 to 5.0

  • Constructor Summary

    Construct an AnalogOscillator

    • SetFrequency

      public void SetFrequency​(double newFrequency)
      Set the Frequency of the oscillator
      Specified by:
      SetFrequency in class OscillatorBaseClass
      Parameters:
      newFrequency - a frequency from 0 to 20,000 Hz.

    • SetDriftAmount

      public void SetDriftAmount​(double driftAmount)
      Set the amount of oscillator drift. Analog oscillators are imperfect and can drift out of tune.
      Parameters:
      driftAmount - The amount to drift from 0.0 to 1.0.

    • SetPulseWidth

      public void SetPulseWidth​(double width)
      Sets the pulse width of the pulse wave.
      Specified by:
      SetPulseWidth in class OscillatorBaseClass
      Parameters:
      width - (0.005 to 0.995)
